title: So the scarecrow has 60% winrate mid
body:
I encountered it myself recently, i won.. HOWEVER the damage is ridiculous and it was very hard to kill him but i think riot games has gotten the scarecrow wrong all along perhaps he was never a jungler like the way his kit is set up and everything he is more of a mid laner and im willing to bet $$$$$$ that the people who originally asked for fiddle buffs only play him mid or know the history of the champion well enough to abuse his current foundation in the mid lane rather than the jungle. But seeing the effectiveness of him being mid than jungle REALLY makes me question the balance team..

Does the balance team really question OTHER lanes the champion can abuse when being buffed? 

Im going to say NOPE because of what i experienced and looking at OP.GG anything with 60% is just beyond cancerous and those are only the nerds who acquired the play style first.. NEXT COMES THE SHEEP BAHHHHHHHH

replies.body: he has literally the lowest play % out of the mid laners listed on Op.GG, who cares if his winrate is high its probably only OTP who have hundreds of games who were put mid as secondary role who have played him.

That's how alot of champions start off like who the fuck was playing {{champion:117}}  till recently?? NOBODDYYYYYYYY sheep im telling you

Im betting he could potentially hit the LCS or at least become popular in Korea which will get the play rate going in motion

Fiddlesticks mid is too unreliable. He has no escapes he is too slow.
He won't make it to korea nor the LCS because he would get stomped. 
Like others said, his playrate is so low, it's only OTP playing him. He is not easy to play right and thus I doubt he will pop off like lulu. Besides that, Lulu is strong in synergy with on-hit adcs that's part of the reason she came back. Fiddlesticks doesn't really have such synergy.

A lot of people were. Not as many, but not an insignificant number.

http://www.champion.gg/champion/lulu/Support

This patch she is at 26% play rate this patch, 24% last patch, and 15% the patch before. She has been pretty popuar for a while. Even if you go back to 7.2, 2 months ago roughly, still 10% play rate.

fiddles has always been a strong mage/assassin counter due to his silence. i take him support because mid is crowded out and i dont feel like waiting on a 10 minute timer just to get my secondary role anyway
